an5.44:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an5.44:1.2: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena uggassa gahapatino vesalikassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an5.44:1.3: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesaliko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho uggo gahapati vesaliko bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.44:2.1: “Sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an5.44:2.4: tam me bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an5.44:3.1: “Sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an5.44:3.4: tam me bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an5.44:4.1: “Sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an5.44:4.4: tam me bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an5.44:5.1: “Sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an5.44:5.3: Manapo me, bhante, salinam odano vicitakalako anekasupo anekabyanjano;
an5.44:5.4: tam me bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an5.44:6.1: “Sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an5.44:6.4: tani me bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an5.44:7.1: “Sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an5.44:7.3: Manapo me, bhante, pallanko gonakatthato patalikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccattharano sauttaracchado ubhatolohitakupadhano.
an5.44:7.6: Idam me, bhante, candanaphalakam agghati adhikasatasahassam;
an5.44:7.7: tam me bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an5.44:7.9: Atha kho bhagava uggam gahapatim vesalikam imina anumodaniyena anumodi:
an5.44:10.1: Atha kho bhagava uggam gahapatim vesalikam imina anumodaniyena anumoditva utthayasana pakkami.
an5.44:11.1: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesaliko aparena samayena kalamakasi.
an5.44:11.2: Kalankato ca uggo gahapati vesaliko annataram manomayam kayam upapajji.
an5.44:11.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an5.44:11.4: Atha kho uggo devaputto abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thitam kho uggam devaputtam bhagava etadavoca:
an5.44:11.7: Atha kho bhagava uggam devaputtam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
